name: Richard
bio: Richard. But in the family circle I’m mostly called Atis (Atibila)

name: Abudu Bismark
bio: I'm Abudu Bismark a son of Mr John Abudu popularly known as 3gieb33 home,who is also a son of Abudu Naga and Dr Assibi Abudu is their elderly brother from another mother but same father

name: Hassan
bio: I'm Hassan, and I was born in 1986 to Timilie and Assibi Abudu. I'm currently based in Accra, Ghana, working as a software engineer. I spend all day making and fixing web applications for technology companies abroad. Fun fact: I love art, especially photography. And most definitely music as well. But I'm a fan of most arts.

name: Kamba Abudu
bio: Hey y’all! Kamba Abudu here. Hope you’re all doing good! To add, son of Assibi O Abudu, brother to Hassan Abudu and Aisha Abudu, but different mothers. I'm a software and systems engineer, living in the UK.

name: Martin Atubiga Ndebala
bio: You are most welcome, I'm very happy to added.My name is Martin Atubiga Ndebala.Atubiga is the son of Tampugre that's Mr Abudu younger brother.Abudu and Tampugre are direct brothers. I present myself there, salute everybody having good fun today.
